name: Magirune - A casual dungeon crawler
description:
Still in development.

After getting going to the empty chest, you are stuck in the cave and need to find an other way out.

This game combines my love of Magic Tower and Fairune. Still in development and built the first 15 levels.

Instructions W, A, S, DMovementEUse potionRGo back to checkpoint

Killing an enemy the first time gives 10xp. Next time it is killed gives 1xp.
